text:
Collector M. Karunakaran declared a local holiday for all educational institutions and State Government offices on March 23 in view of ‘Panguni Uththiram.’

In a statement, Dr. Karunakaran said the local holiday would not be applicable to the scheduled examinations and the teachers associated with these exams. The educational institutions and government offices in the district will work on April 9 (Saturday) to compensate this holiday, the Collector said.
title: Local holiday on March 23
